description:
Abel is a corn-fed 19-year-old from the midwest. He was a high school football star who decided to move west with his friend for some girl chasing. His friend was interested in doing videos and I actually met Abel because he arrived with his friend for the first interview. Both of them were really hot — Abel was sweet and shy and his friend was kind of cocky. I guess Abel liked the idea of making some extra money, so it wasn't long before he was in front of the camera.
This guy has a very young face, with a nice muscular body, a great dick, and a nice set of balls.
title: Abel
